Articles.Content:
Hi all

I see that the .20 update has been recently released. . . however, I cannot seem to find where to download and install the update. . . I realize this is probably just me missing something obvious, but would appreciate if someone could point me in the right direction.

Thanks in advance!

Edited May 22, 2013 by Uberick
Go to the KSP Store, and download KSP.

This should still be valid

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/24527-The-Ultimate-Guide-to-Downloading-KSP!

Log into your account, then clock on "Profile", scroll down and click on the Download button. Then click on your OS and download the game.

Profit!
Log in on the KSP website (I think you do this through the store page, or maybe it's the dowloads page) then click profile and KSP should be there near the bottom, download it and you should have 2.0

If you are on steam it should update automatically or when you click on the game and click update.

If not then you should go to the store log in click profile under where it says your name scroll to the bottom and click update, then what operating system you use.
Thanks! Sorry for being so clueless, I think the excitement fried my brain or something:)

Important tip for upgraders:

Do not copy your .20 folder into your existing .19 folder! Instead, make a new folder for .20 and copy your saves and your ships from .19 into it.
